Package com.ibm.service

Class MovieServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.ibm.service.MovieServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
MovieService
@Service public class MovieServiceImpl extends Object implements MovieService
Implementation of the MovieService interface that provides operations for managing movies.
